meanings.definition: A one-piece garment consisting of a top and shorts, typically worn by women and children.
meanings.sent1: The playsuits on display at the store were colorful and fun.
meanings.sent2: She wore playsuits during the summer to stay cool.
meanings.sent3: The playsuits at the fashion show made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of playsuits was a rainbow of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The playsuits in the magazine looked so comfortable and stylish.

meanings.sent1: She playsuits every weekend when the weather is warm.
meanings.sent2: Do you think she playsuits to work?
meanings.sent3: He playsuits like a fashion model on the runway.
meanings.sent4: Playing with confidence, she playsuits with grace.
meanings.sent5: The way she playsuits shows her love for fashion.
